channel.title: Need good coder for a great idea
channel.description:
I want to create a server that has the following things:
admin island
pking everywhere except dummys and bank
ice spells hold and entangle
all spells look the same
range hits fair and crystal bows aloud
no massing and teling
auto restarts every 1 hour
new skill called server time the more money you get
teleblock working
clan arena for clan fights
copes with loads of people
if one codes one for me please pm me

item.title: Need good coder for a great idea
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

You can hire a coder at my book a coder topic.
I would recommend Testscape for a beginner.
It’s a custom source.

Read full topic
item.source: Need good coder for a great idea

item.title: Need good coder for a great idea
item.dc:creator: @billy00 billy00
item.description:
@billy00 wrote:

Testscape is like… start out with 10/10 hp and all stats are 1/1 and you are combat level 3. With PimpScape you have 99/99 hp and all stats are 1/1 but you start out at combat level 41. Testscape is just a tiny bit nooby.

Read full topic
item.source: Need good coder for a great idea

item.title: Need good coder for a great idea
item.dc:creator: @pur3str_pk2 pur3str pk2
item.source: Need good coder for a great idea

item.title: Need good coder for a great idea
item.dc:creator: @billy00 billy00
item.description:
@billy00 wrote:

I really like PimpScape source for the pking areas. Although I did make varrock safe and a few other places such as ::range but as far as i’m concerned go with PimpScape source and use tutorials. PimpScape sources are most compatible with tutorials on forums.

Read full topic
item.source: Need good coder for a great idea
